attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
heroin is on prescription for addicts in the U.K....
Ww think cannabis should be too.
cannabis has so many medical benefits,cannabis is safer than tobacco and alcohol.
Nobody has ever died from abusing cannabis.
we think cannabis should be on prescription...
